name: part_003
file: tmp_【#ノエル生誕はっぴーLIVE】今日は誕生日！！好きなことしてはっぴーになろおおお✨【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [E1HXg-kjOI8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: The members conclude the beef bowl tasting contest and announce the results.
Shirogane Noel performs the song 'Fuwafuwa♪' for her birthday live.

subtitles.original: 優しい。
subtitles.english: It's gentle.

subtitles.original: 特に一番味が濃かったこれは、多分それくらい愛情込められてるんじゃないかなって。
subtitles.english: Especially this one with the strongest flavor, I think it's because that much love was put into it.

subtitles.original: おー、なるほど！
subtitles.english: Oh, I see!

subtitles.original: すごい。あと玉ねぎがすごい何か煮込まれてる感じ。
subtitles.english: Amazing. Also the onions feel really stewed.

subtitles.original: チョコ先あんまり好きじゃないって言ったけど、
subtitles.english: I said Choco-sen doesn't like them much, but...

subtitles.original: チョコ先は自分自身の...自分のために料理をするのではなく我々のために料理してくれたから、
subtitles.english: Choco-sen didn't cook for herself, but for us...

subtitles.original: 確かに！
subtitles.english: True!

subtitles.original: ね、玉ねぎね、野菜を...チョコちゃんとかで。
subtitles.english: Yeah, the onions, the vegetables... with Choco-chan.

subtitles.original: だから玉ねぎ多めでしかも優しくね、煮込んでみたいな感じで。
subtitles.english: So there's lots of onions and it's stewed gently, like that.

subtitles.original: 確かに。
subtitles.english: True.

subtitles.original: それでは、いろは様の回答を見ていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Well then, let's look at Iroha-sama's answer!

subtitles.original: はい、どうぞ！
subtitles.english: Here you go!

subtitles.original: A. ごうきゅう!! B. いっぱん C. ちょこ先生の！
subtitles.english: A. High-end!! B. General C. Choco-sensei's!

subtitles.original: 実は、一緒なんでござるよ！
subtitles.english: Actually, it's the same!

subtitles.original: 完璧。
subtitles.english: Perfect.

subtitles.original: でも正直めっちゃ迷った。特にAとCですごく迷って、
subtitles.english: But honestly, I was really torn. Especially between A and C.

subtitles.original: なるほどね。
subtitles.english: I see.

subtitles.original: え、このAは、まず美味しい！ってなって、
subtitles.english: Uh, this A, first it was "Delicious!"

subtitles.original: なんか食べたことない美味しさを感じて。
subtitles.english: I felt a deliciousness I'd never tasted before.

subtitles.original: なるほどなるほど。
subtitles.english: I see, I see.

subtitles.original: で、Bはなんか食べてるうちにやっと食べ方ちょっと慣れてきて、
subtitles.english: And B, as I was eating, I finally got a bit used to how to eat it...

subtitles.original: 「あ、これ何か半年後ぐらいに...」
subtitles.english: "Ah, this is like in six months..."

subtitles.original: 食べたことある！
subtitles.english: I've eaten it!

subtitles.original: そう！なんかこの感じはひょっとして風真、半年後ぐらいに何か経験したことあるかもしれないと思って。
subtitles.english: Yes! I thought maybe Kazama had experienced this feeling about six months ago.

subtitles.original: で、Cはなんか本当にめっちゃ甘くて美味しかったんでござるよ。
subtitles.english: And C was really sweet and delicious.

subtitles.original: ってAとCがどっちだろうってすごく迷っちゃって。
subtitles.english: So I was really torn between A and C.

subtitles.original: なるほどね。
subtitles.english: I see.

subtitles.original: でも比べた時にずっと食べてたいのはCだから、Cがチョコ先のだなと思って。
subtitles.english: But when I compared them, the one I wanted to keep eating was C, so I thought C must be Choco-sen's.

subtitles.original: 決定権はずっと食べていたいかどうかだった。
subtitles.english: The deciding factor was whether I wanted to keep eating it.

subtitles.original: お二人ともね牛丼への熱い思いをありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you both for your passionate thoughts on beef bowls!

subtitles.original: それでは、正解はこちら！
subtitles.english: Well then, the answer is here!

subtitles.original: 正解 A: 高級牛丼 B: 一般的な牛丼 C: 手作り牛丼
subtitles.english: Correct Answer A: High-end Beef Bowl B: General Beef Bowl C: Homemade Beef Bowl

subtitles.original: Aは高級牛丼！
subtitles.english: A is High-end Beef Bowl!

subtitles.original: Bは一般的な牛丼！
subtitles.english: B is General Beef Bowl!

subtitles.original: そしてCはチョコの牛丼ということで！
subtitles.english: And C is Choco's Beef Bowl!

subtitles.original: やったー！正解！
subtitles.english: We did it! Correct!

subtitles.original: 牛丼はそれぐらいさ、なんかあれなんですよ。
subtitles.english: Beef bowls are like that.

subtitles.original: あまり食べたことない人でもなんか味が分かりやすくね、もうとにかく一般食ですね。
subtitles.english: Even for people who haven't eaten them much, the taste is easy to understand, they're just a common food.

subtitles.original: そう、いや、普通に日本の、まあ文化的な...
subtitles.english: Yeah, well, normally Japan's, well, cultural...

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっと良いこと言いたいんですけど、全然語彙力が無いんですけど。
subtitles.english: Ah, I want to say something good, but I have no vocabulary at all.

subtitles.original: まあ牛丼はとにかくね日常食なんで。
subtitles.english: Well, anyway, beef bowls are a daily meal.

subtitles.original: はい！もう完璧です。イエイ！
subtitles.english: Yes! Perfect. Yay!

subtitles.original: いやでもこれなら毎日食べれると思う。
subtitles.english: No but I think I could eat this every day.

subtitles.original: 確かに！牛丼本当に毎日食べれる。ガチガチ。
subtitles.english: True! I could really eat beef bowls every day. For real, for real.

subtitles.original: え、嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Oh, I'm happy!

subtitles.original: 牛丼団長様毎...毎晩さ、こ...毎食か、毎食食べれるっての分かったでしょう？味全然違うんですよ。
subtitles.english: Gyudon Captain-sama... every night... every meal, every meal, you saw I can eat it, right? The tastes are completely different.

subtitles.original: 全然違う！
subtitles.english: Completely different!

subtitles.original: これを見て挑戦したいと思ったホロメンは居るのかどうか。
subtitles.english: I wonder if there are any Holo-members who want to take on this challenge after seeing this.

subtitles.original: 我こそはという方はね、是非挑戦してみてください。
subtitles.english: Those who think they have what it takes, please give it a try.

subtitles.original: 以上、第1回ホロライブ牛丼女王決定戦でした！
subtitles.english: That concludes the 1st Hololive Beef Bowl Queen Finals!

subtitles.original: イエイ！めっちゃ美味しかった！
subtitles.english: Yay! It was so delicious!

subtitles.original: ちなみにみんな忘れてるかもしれないけど、これ生誕祭のライブです。
subtitles.english: By the way, everyone might have forgotten, but this is a birthday live.

subtitles.original: このあとライブパートなんで、はい、いっぱい食べたんでいっぱい歌って踊ります！
subtitles.english: The live performance part starts now, so, yes, I've eaten a lot so I'll sing and dance a lot!

subtitles.original: 背は高いほうがいいけど
subtitles.english: I'd prefer someone tall

subtitles.original: そんなタイプじゃなかったの
subtitles.english: But you weren't that type

subtitles.original: 気難しい感じどっちかっていうと苦手だったかな
subtitles.english: I guess I was a bit bad with the difficult types

subtitles.original: 話すと全然違ってて
subtitles.english: But when we talk, it's totally different

subtitles.original: 笑うと目が子供みたいで
subtitles.english: When you laugh, your eyes are like a child's

subtitles.original: クシャクシャになっちゃう目元なんかにすごいドキってしたりして
subtitles.english: And I get really excited by the way your eyes crinkle up

subtitles.original: でもなんで本当のこと言っちゃうバカなの
subtitles.english: But why do you say the truth, you're such a fool

subtitles.original: 最初は彼女いないって嘘つくのが礼儀でしょ普通
subtitles.english: Usually it's common courtesy to lie at first and say you don't have a girlfriend

subtitles.original: そうよなんでこんな振られた気分なの
subtitles.english: That's right, why do I feel like I've been dumped

subtitles.original: 夢見る前から叶わない恋って気づいちゃったじゃない
subtitles.english: I've realized it's a love that won't come true even before I can dream

subtitles.original: 大好きになったどうしようまだ出会ったばかりなんだけど
subtitles.english: I've fallen in love, what should I do? We've only just met

subtitles.original: 切ない気持ちがあふれてきて胸がキュンってなってるよ
subtitles.english: Painful feelings are overflowing and my heart is throbbing

subtitles.original: そうよ大好きなんだどうにもこうにもすごいことになってきたよ
subtitles.english: That's right, I love you, things have gotten really serious
